'''Marofeto Liano''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|You find a man dressed in worn, dirty leather armor. His long, scraggly beard is encrusted with salt, his curling hair has clearly not seen a comb in some time, and the toenails of his bare fear are cracked and torn.

The only thing of any value that he carries is an amulet.}}

Marofeto is a former Goldpact Knight who was ejected from the order after a botched job. Since then, he wandered the Deadfire, rededicating himself to self-discipline and abstention from worldly distractions. In his view, it is through suffering that the soul becomes strong.

* This character offers [training](/marofetoLianosTraining/) (+1 [Intimidate](/intimidate/), +1 [Insight](/insight/)) for {{cp2|3000}}.
* You can also obtain his amulet with [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 6 or [Bluff](/bluff/) / [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 6, giving you [Claim and Refusal](/claimAndRefusal/).
* If you obtain his amulet through the Intimidate check, he will refuse to train you.
}}

## Behind the scenes

* Marofeto Liano is one of the 10 [backer created NPCs](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireBackerCreatedContentBeAnNpc/), created as part of {{poe2}}'s crowdfunding campaign.
